translations: n.象征，象征主义；符号论；记号

phrs.translation: 象征主义, 符号体系, 象征性, 符号主义
语音象征, 声音象征
色彩的象征性, 颜色象征

sentences.sentence: The scene is so rich in symbolism that any explanation risks spoiling the effect.
sentences.translation: 这个场景的象征手法非常丰富，任何解释都可能破坏其效果。

sentences.sentence: The symbolism may come from the fact that the olive tree takes a long time to produce fruit, so olives could only be cultivated successfully in long periods of peace.
sentences.translation: 它的象征意义可能来自于橄榄树需要很长时间才能结出果实，所以橄榄只能在长久的和平时期才能被成功种植。

sentences.sentence: The symbolism of every gesture will be of vital importance during the short state visit.
sentences.translation: 这次短暂的国事访问中的一举一动都有极其重要的象征意义。
